Mailing Address: c/o H.O.P.E. Okanagan715 Beaver Lake Rd, #118Winfield, BC     V4V 1E6
Alternate Contact: Patricia Adams, House of Hope Manager; Phone: 250.215.6498
Service Details: - Provides nighttime outreach for homeless and exploited women in the Kelowna area, specifically in the downtown core- At dusk, seven nights per week volunteers take to the streets of downtown, hand out supply bags containing basic necessities, seek to build relationships with the women, encourage them, and support them to get the help they need- Volunteers also take "Bad Date Reports" and report instances of violence and abuse against sex-workers- Bad Date Reports are then circulated Okanagan wide, and also in Prince George, Kamloops, and Merritt- Harm Reduction products are handed out to men and women nightly- Specialized Narcan Team goes out two nights per week dispensing Narcan Kits to men and women- Voluteer positions available
Hours: Street Outreach: 7 nights per week from dusk to dawn
How to Apply: Please visit the website for detailed information
